meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the December 12, 2023 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the December 12, 2023 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Inducement Resolution for LIH Paradise Gardens Preservation, LP
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to LIH Paradise Gardens Preservation, LP to provide financing for a multifamily residential rental development for persons of low and moderate income (Paradise Gardens Apartments) located at 1500 N Garrett Avenue in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $18,000,000.00 authorizing the filing of an application for allocation of private activity bonds with the Texas Bond Review Board; and containing other related provisions.

agenda_items.title: Review of the Corporation’s 2023 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s 2023 Annual Report.

agenda_items.title: Dallas HFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas HFC Treasurer’s report for eleven months ending November 30, 2023.

agenda_items.title: Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of December 31, 2023.

agenda_items.title: Update from Staffing Task Force meeting
agenda_items.description: Update from Staffing Task Force meeting held January 3, 2024.

financial_items.description: Inducement Resolution for a loan to LIH Paradise Gardens Preservation, LP
